  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable

    public class ToolMenuClass
extends javafx.scene.control.ToolBar
    The tool menu so that only one is pressed

    • Field Detail

      • group

        private final javafx.scene.control.ToggleGroup group
        This is a group to hold the buttons. This ensures only one button is pressed.

      • ToolMenuInputs

        private ToolMenuInputsRow ToolMenuInputs
        the location of all selected

      • tools

        public java.lang.String[][] tools
        This is a string of tools. The order of each subset loop goes as follows: NameOfTool, TextToDisplay, ToolTip

      • testToggleChange

        private final javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<javafx.scene.control.Toggle> testToggleChange
        Updates the settings shown when the TypeToDraw is updated

        Adds a tool into the menu

        name - the name of the tool
